raw akas.title: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Tekketsu no Orphans

akas: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Tekketsu no Orphans (original title)
Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans USA
akas from release info: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Tekketsu no Orphans (original title)
Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans USA

1.title: New Blood

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Mikazuki's group, Tekkadan, is commissioned to escort Kudelia on an inspection of a halfmetal mine. Under Tekkadan's protection, she completes the inspection schedule without incident. But suddenly, Tekkadan finds itself under attack by space pirates.

2.title: In the Midst of Jealousy

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Despite some casualties, Tekkadan successfully repulses the space pirates of the Dawn Horizon Corps. However, it appears that this enemy was just one part of a huge space pirate group, and Orga decides to counterattack in anticipation of further assaults.

3.title: Battle Before Dawn

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Deploying all of its fighting strength, Tekkadan attempts to capture Sandoval Reuters, the leader of the Dawn Horizon Corps. Gjallarhorn's outer lunar orbit joint fleet Arianrhod also joins the battle, turning it into a three-way free-for-all.

4.title: The Trigger for Promotion

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Mikazuki and Orga visit Allium, leader of the ideological group Terra Liberionis, to resolve the issues surrounding the attacks of the Dawn Horizon Corps. Meanwhile, McGillis arrives at Gjallarhorn's Martian branch and offers Tekkadan a certain proposal.

5.title: Inauguration of the Arbrau Defense Forces

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Tekkadan's Earth branch, which is now serving as a military advisor to Arbrau, is consumed with preparing the launch ceremony for the Arbrau Defense Forces. At Makanai's request, Tekkadan takes charge of security for the ceremony venue.

6.title: Silent War

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: A conflict between the rival economic blocs Arbrau and SAU breaks out as their armies clash on the Balfour Plain. Tekkadan also joins the battle under the command of Galan Mossa, but its members become exhausted as the war of attrition continues for days.

7.title: My Friend

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Gjallarhorn receives a mediation request from the SAU. In order to break the prolonged stalemate, McGillis personally enters the battlefield in a mobile suit. Galan's team launches an attack on McGillis, who is whittling down Arbrau's fighting strength.

8.title: Sovereign of Mars

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: The fighting ends as the rival economic blocs SAU and Arbrau agree to peace negotiations. As they remember their fallen comrades, the members of Tekkadan decide to withdraw from Earth.

9.title: Vidar Rising

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Via a certain matter on Earth, the connection between Tekkadan and McGillis grows even stronger. Meanwhile, the Gundam Vidar, which has been undergoing adjustment by the Arianrhod fleet, finally rolls out.

10.title: Awakening Calamity

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Tekkadan has discovered a huge object at a mine it is managing. Having received a message from Orga about the object's true nature, McGillis decides to pay a secret visit to Mars.

11.title: Stained Wings

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: The awakened mobile armor, along with a huge quantity of sub-units, heads for a densely populated area to begin its attack. Tekkadan attempts to hold back the onslaught, but is helpless against its overwhelming power and superior numbers.

12.title: Battle for Chryse

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Outnumbered, Tekkadan turns to McGillis for assistance, and launches a mobile armor mopping-up operation. Meanwhile, a strange phenomenon occurs in the Gundam Frames that are confronting the mobile armor.

13.title: Hunter of Angels

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Mikazuki faces off against the mobile armor. The battle continues with mounting intensity.

14.title: Counsel

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Lafter and the other Turbines members take their leave of Tekkadan. Meanwhile, at Teiwaz, the organization's number two Jasley Donomikols plans a new maneuver.

15.title: Lit by a Blazing Sun

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Tekkadan has been thwarted in its attempt to rescue Turbines from danger. Orga restrains himself in response to Naze's wishes, but...

16.title: Natural for a Human

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: A modest funeral service is held aboard the Saisei. But Jasley has been preparing yet another stratagem.

17.title: Settlement

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: With the repairs to the Barbatos complete, Tekkadan musters its fighting strength. The members ready their resolve for the confrontation with Jasley.

18.title: Revealed Intentions

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Gjallarhorn's Earth headquarters has been captured in a coup d'état by young officers. Among them is McGillis, who heads for a facility underneath the headquarters.

19.title: The Man Who Holds the Soul

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: The Arianrhod fleet, led by Rustal Elion, attempts to gather all its forces to fight the coup d'état.

20.title: If This Is the End

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: After many complications, Tekkadan finally joins the battle against the Arianrhod fleet, but...

21.title: For Whom

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: Tekkadan revives and launches an attack, aiming to escape the battlefield. Meanwhile, the fight between McGillis and Gaelio becomes increasingly ferocious.

22.title: Scapegoat

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: Tekkadan plans to return to its Martian headquarters and start over. The situation, however, has undergone a dramatic reversal.

23.title: Promise

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: Tekkadan is in a difficult predicament. A huge Gjallarhorn force then begins deploying around its Martian headquarters.

24.title: McGillis Fareed

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: Gjallarhorn intends to launch a mopping-up operation against Tekkadan. The hour of its commencement is drawing steadily closer...

25.title: Their Place

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: Gjallarhorn begins its Tekkadan mopping-up operation. Facing this, Tekkadan's future is...

1.title: Iron and Blood...

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Orga's team has been hand picked to escort Kudelia, the young leader of the Martian independence movement, to Earth for an important meeting. Just as preparations for departure are underway, Gjallarhorn attacks the base in an attempt on Kudelia's life.

2.title: Barbatos

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: The adults of CGS flee in the face of Gjallarhorn's attack, using Mikazuki and the other children as decoys. Gathering the children who have been left behind, Orga decides to fight back against Gjallarhorn, and puts a certain plan into motion.

3.title: Glorious Demise

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Thanks to Mikazuki and the Gundam Barbatos, Orga's group has temporarily repulsed Gjallarhorn, though not without many sacrifices. As they are discussing their next move, one of Gjallarhorn's Graze mobile suits again appears at the CGS base.

4.title: The Price of Life

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Kudelia is distressed that so many boys have lost their lives because of her. Mikazuki takes her to the farm run by Biscuit's grandmother, where an unexpected encounter awaits.

5.title: Beyond the Red Sky

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Kudelia and Tekkadan finally leave Mars behind them and head for Earth. With a ship waiting for them, they attempt to travel by shuttle to a low-orbital station, but are attacked by Coral's Gjallarhorn forces.

6.title: As for Them

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The members of Tekkadan need a guide in order to reach Earth despite Gjallarhorn's surveillance. To gain a powerful backer, they attempt to negotiate with Teiwaz, which is based in the Jupiter Sphere.

7.title: Whaling

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Tekkadan has made contact with Turbines, which runs Teiwaz's transport division. But they find themselves clashing with Turbines over their group's origins and property.

8.title: The Form of Closeness

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Having demonstrated Tekkadan's strength and legitimacy to Naze, the leader of Turbines, Orga and the others renew their negotiations with Teiwaz. Meanwhile Atra visits Turbines's warship, bringing the frustrated Kudelia with her.

9.title: Sakazuki

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Accompanied by Naze, Tekkadan visits the Saisei, the stronghold of Teiwaz, in order to meet with Teiwaz's representative McMurdo Barriston. Here, Orga receives a surprising proposal from Naze.

10.title: A Letter from Tomorrow

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Tekkadan and Turbines go on ahead to Earth, leaving Mikazuki and Yukinojo on the Saisei to complete final adjustments to the Barbatos. But the events aboard the Saisei have greatly affected their respective states of mind.

11.title: Human Debris

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: While on patrol, Akihiro and Takaki encounter unknown enemies and engage them in battle. The attackers turn out to be Brewers, a pirate group that operates between Mars and Earth.

12.title: The Shoals

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Mikazuki and Orga learn that Akihiro's long-lost younger brother is one of the Brewers mobile suit pilots. Tekkadan challenges Brewers in order to get back Akihiro's brother.

13.title: Funeral Rites

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: The battle with Brewers has cost many lives on both sides. The survivors hold a funeral service to pray for the rebirth of their fallen comrades.

14.title: Vessel of Hope

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: After overcoming many difficulties, Tekkadan is finally about to reach Earth. Its members head for the Dort colony cluster, to deliver an item that Teiwaz asked them to transport when they were aboard the Saisei.

15.title: Trail of Footprints

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Just as on Mars, the colonies suffer great disparities with Earth, and a protest movement has begun among the increasingly dissatisfied workers. As it gradually intensifies, Tekkadan is caught up in various schemes.

16.title: Fumitan Admoss

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: The colony workers have launched a protest movement against the company that employs them. As they grow more radical, the situation finally develops to the point of a Gjallarhorn intervention. Before she knows it, Kudelia has been drawn into the heart of the uprising.

17.title: Kudelia's Decision

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Kudelia and Tekkadan witness Gjallarhorn's brutal suppression of the workers. Seeing the true situation of the colonies, Kudelia makes a fateful decision.

18.title: Voice

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Tekkadan's members attempt to leave the colonies behind and descend to Earth at last, but they miss their chance due to one last item of business in the colonies. They are contacted by someone who claims to be their supporter.

19.title: The Gravity of Wishes

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Following a resupply by the Montag Company, Tekkadan prepare their descent to Earth, with a Gjallarhorn fleet standing in their way.

20.title: Brother

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: Tekkadan has finally made it to Earth, successfully introducing Kudelia to Arbrau's representative, Makanai Togonosuke. However, they will have to accompany Makanai to a parliamentary general session taking place in Edmonton.

21.title: To the Place of Return

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: During preparations to depart for Edmonton, Tekkadan finds itself under attack by Gjallarhorn. Setting a trap for their relentless pursuers, Orga makes a counterattack.

22.title: Not Yet Home

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: Though Tekkadan is exhausted by its repeated battles with Gjallarhorn, its members are still determined to get to Edmonton, and they hasten toward their goal.

23.title: The Final Lie

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: As Tekkadan heads for Edmonton, it finds Carta blocking the way, seeking a showdown. However, Mikazuki and the others won't let their progress be halted, and they press on ahead.

24.title: A Future Reward

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: Orga and the other Tekkadan members have finally reached Edmonton, but they are attacked by Gjallarhorn, which seeks to prevent Makanai from making it to the parliamentary session.

25.title: Tekkadan

episode of.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: As the fierce battle between Tekkadan and Gjallarhorn continues, a new threat appears. To protect Kudelia and the others, Mikazuki must confront it alone.

imdb.plot outline: 300 years after a great conflict between Earth and Mars known as the "Calamity War," a woman named Cordelia sets out on a journey to Earth to speak for the independence of the Martian city of Chryse, which is under the control of the Earth government. Escorting her are members of the private security company CGS, Mikazuki Augus and Orga Itsuka. When a group named Gjallarhorn attacks CGS and Cordelia, Orga sees this as a chance to rebel against CGS and launch a coup. Mikazuki and Orga are thrust into a new conflict. To fend off Gjallarhorn, Mikazuki rides an old mobile suit from the Calamity War, powered by a nuclear reactor, the Gundam Barbatos.
imdb.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans
plot: 300 years after the Calamity War, a ragtag group of freedom fighters and an ancient Mobile Suit rise to the call for justice, once and for all.

300 years after a great conflict between Earth and Mars known as the "Calamity War," a woman named Cordelia sets out on a journey to Earth to speak for the independence of the Martian city of Chryse, which is under the control of the Earth government. Escorting her are members of the private security company CGS, Mikazuki Augus and Orga Itsuka. When a group named Gjallarhorn attacks CGS and Cordelia, Orga sees this as a chance to rebel against CGS and launch a coup. Mikazuki and Orga are thrust into a new conflict. To fend off Gjallarhorn, Mikazuki rides an old mobile suit from the Calamity War, powered by a nuclear reactor, the Gundam Barbatos.::Source: ANN

camera: Arri Alexa XT M, Zeiss Master Prime, Fujinon Premier and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
Arri Alexa XT Plus, Zeiss Master Prime, Fujinon Premier and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
